intro: Cyclophyllum valetonianum, commonly known as the spiral leaf cyclophyllum, is a unique plant species characterized by its distinctive spiral-shaped leaves. It belongs to the family Cycadaceae and is native to specific regions in Southeast Asia. The plant exhibits a slow growth rate and thrives in humid, tropical climates with well-drained soil. Its foliage is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits. Due to habitat loss, it is considered a rare and endangered species requiring conservation efforts.
